casebody.data:
Angelo TEDESCO, Trustee
v.
Resmiji AGOLI et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 12, 2018

Justin J. Garcia, in support of the petition.

Jeremy S. Donnelly, in opposition.

The petition by the named defendant and the defendant Fikri Development, LLC, for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 182 Conn. App. 291, 189 A.3d 672 (2018), is denied.
